mapper.insert: insert into virtual_house_price(aptCode, price) (select h.aptCode, trim((select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode))) price from houseinfo h);
mapper.select: select v.no, v.aptCode, v.price as spendPrice, h.lat, h.lng, h.dongName from virtual_house_price v join houseinfo h on v.aptCode = h.aptCode order by v.aptCode
